entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • I accidentaly found performance reggresion using"mandelbrot algorithm" #80757
  • [API Proposal]: `List<T>.Create<TState>(int, TState, SpanAction<T, TState>)` #80756
  • Manually resolving `JsonTypeInfo` + `Serialize methods` slower than call `Serializer` directly #80750
  • Implement support for updating generic methods during EnC/Hot Reload #80749
  • [NativeAot] Use ComputeManagedAssemblies Task from ILLink to find managed framework assemblies #80748
  • ThreadPool consumes about 10 or up to 20 percent CPU when application is completely idle #80746
    8.0.0
  • [test] Add mobile workload test for startup hooks for Mono #80742
  • [API Proposal]: Vector2.PerpDot #80739
  • [mono][perf] WASM disk size regression on 04 Jan 2023 #80737
    8.0.0
  • CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider("JScript") does not return JavaScript provider #80736
  • [mono][jit] Mono JIT doesn't handle invalid offset jumps #80735
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8FormatterTests #80745
  • Regressions from early liveness pass #80743
  • Regressions from Roslyn update #80744
  • JIT: Consider removing GT_JMP #80732
    Future
  • JIT: local morph ref counting does not handle GT_JMP #80731
    8.0.0
  • OneLocBuild is failing in official builds #80729
  • Debugged macOS app crashes when requesting access to photo library #80727
  • Bump ICU to version 72 #80721
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Implement CryptoStream Write overload that takes ReadOnlySpan #80540
  • Regressions in System.Text.Perf_Utf8Encoding and System.Text.Tests.Perf_Encoding #80247
    8.0.0
  • Crash in coreclr!WKS::gc_heap::make_unused_array #79327
    8.0.0
  • Memory leak in blazor server application .net 7 #80258
    7.0.x
  • JsonSerializerOptions.AddContext should allow context composition #80527
    8.0.0
  • Hang when running .NET 7 through Wine through Rosetta 2 #80733
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'op1->gtEffectiveVal() == base' in `gtMarkAddrMode` when runing aspnet collections with JitStress=2 #80690
    8.0.0
  • Update src/tests infra to use `DOTNET_`-prefixed environment variables #76484
    Future
  • Improve Enum function performance (TryParse, ToString, Parse, etc...) #79762

PullRequests

Created

  • Final removal of uses of Windows wide char printing #80758
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove the second type parameter from CastingConverter #80755
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Allow retaining the original casing for known header values #80754
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Add System.Text.CompositeFormat #80753
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Default to ILC host architecture that matches OS architecture on Windows #80752
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement XML log fixer for Helix #80751
  • Support use of fast-path serialization in combined JsonSerializerContexts. #80741
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix GC hole for Armv8.1 Atomics #80740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Account for GT_JMP implicit uses in local morph ref counting #80734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Ensure call offset is greater than offset of other active calls #80728
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Make TypeComponentsCache trimmable #80726
    NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debug]Press alt-shift-d and open firefox debug tab attached to the blazor app #80722
    area-Debugger-mono

Merged

  • Introduce TieredPGO_InstrumentedTierAlwaysOptimized for PGO tests #80524
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Change TrimMode setting for templates, and tests #80639
    area-Build-mono
  • Solve recently introduce ASCII regression #80709
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [wbt] correctly add RunAnalyzers property to template projects #80747
  • [mono][aot] Reduce collisions in mono_aot_method_hash () for some wra… #80667
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix multiple dumps from being generated #80708
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Fix parsing the output of ping on Samsung phones #80692
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.14
  • Fix fuzzers for .NET 8 SDK publish #80673
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add the DbgDisablePagemapUse environment variable to control pagemap usage #80714
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Don't produce ILLink package in runtime #80720
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] debugger tests- Misc improvements #80660
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add location of NativeAot Corelib project #80738
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Update JsonSerializerOptions.AddContext to have combine semantics. #80698
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add statically linked libnuma support for AOT #80671
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use CompressionLevel.SmallestSize in Bundler #80372
    area-HostModel
  • Don't try to fold ADD(CNS, CNS-handle) in gtWalkOp #80704
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] symbolicate to avoid undefined stack #80707
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Update cross-arm-alpine image to Ubuntu 22.04 host #80725
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Disable onelocbuild in official builds #80730
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix overwriting of superpmi log file #80716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Decommit memory as needed" #80723
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make it possible to construct StackFrame without MethodBase #80681
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Sync ILLink #80678
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Remove usage of ComPlus_ variables in tests #78377
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Increase superpmi-replay x64 parallelism #80712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • JIT: maintain pred lists during loop unrolling #80625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • More timeout checks in RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #74531
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Avoid using a null heap to decommit the mark array #80640
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Fix nested non-byref like VC with no pointer fields #80642
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT: avoid helper calls for static fields #79709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Permit CngKey backed ECDH interoperability from different KSPs #80571
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Conditionally disable `--allow-undefined` #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT for FreeBSD #80323
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SetupProperties to set properties related to NativeAOT and remove the top-level defaults #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Draft] Test merging IL_Conformance #80597
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - `CAST` removals for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Switch to using the .NET SDK properties that are defined to provide the TFM instead of using the assembly that defines System.Object #80646
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, tenet-performance, source-generator
  • Enable partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT fixes around data flow analysis #80694
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • add unsupported attributes to System.Net.Security #80717
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • [browser] improve default initial memory size #80507
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Add a stress mode that poisons implicit byrefs #80691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Add error code to the assert error message #80701
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 7.0.5
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Add error code to the assert error message #80702
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.15
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Strip all symbols on macOS as well #80515
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement new `ComWrappers` APIs #80402
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add 16 byte default alignment to interp frames #80700
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Improve CI path-changes-based-triggers to work better #79127
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Remove "promoted struct death vars" map and streamline TreeLifeUpdater #80501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Startup hooks support in Mono #80391
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][aot] Optimize the layout of the extra_method_table. #80682
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add AVX2 support to IndexOfAnyValues #78863
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • WIP: Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Add NetworkChange implementation using PeriodicTimer #80548
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Harden and re-enable DualMode socket tests #80715
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [draft][browser] enable closure compiler for dotnet.js #80178
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fold `static readonly VectorX` to GT_CNS_VEC #80670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][http] Fix blocking of streaming response and abort #80693
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix indexing of correlated diagnostic binaries #80652
    area-Infrastructure
  • Prefix exported symbols defined via EntryPoint of UnmanagedCallersOnl… #79880
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Ilc is crashing on some input #2174

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove unnecessary symbol indirections #2173
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to May 22 #2172

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: dispatch #2145
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Simplify LLVM object writer #2171
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet pack -o` does not seem to work #29979
  • Dependent .deps.json file not published when a package with PrivateAssets=all is included #29974
  • It_builds_successfully_when_targeting_net_framework test wants to compile a .NETCoreApp template on .NET Framework #29968

PullRequests

Created

  • Use Runtime ILLink package on SDK #29983
    Area-ILLink, DO NOT MERGE
  • Add support for EnableRequestDelegateGenerator flag #29982
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29980
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29976
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Stable branding for 7.0.200 GA release #29942
    Area-Infrastructure
  • revert part of #29916 #29966
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29945
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29940
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix an issue with delegate declaration. Fix an issue with Simplifier and removing nullability. #29961
    Area-GenAPI
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2089678 #29963
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce Dependabot for updating the same dependencies used in dotnet/templating #29921
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2089789 #29964
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Require await to apply nullable postconditions to task-returning calls #6888
  • Expand lambdas and method body definitions to allow any block like statements #6887

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add roles spec covering static extensions #6880
  • Update using-alias-types.md #6883

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Refactor primary view selection so we have the same code path for nav bars and document outline #66448
  • Cannot create nuint to UInt32 conversion in custom CoreLib #66442
  • Visual Studio 2022 makes double quote escaped when pasting copied text #66441

Closed

  • The `SyntaxGenerator` class omits `this` and `params` keyword for extension methods #65835
  • The `SyntaxGenerator` does not generate implicit conversion operators #65833
  • Document.GetOptionsAsync returns wrong TabSize for VB document #66325
    17.6
  • Incorrect Solution snapshot used for diagnostic analysis #48351
    Backlog
  • Implicitly typed lambdas with `[UnscopedRef]` don't match their own anonymous delegate types #63565
    17.6
  • Date format IntelliSense popup uses local format for en-us #60729
    17.6
  • Provide separate `yield return` and `yield break` completions instead of a single `yield` #65390
  • VS incorrectly report a build as succeeded when a Roslyn code generator warning CS8785 treated as error fails the build #65313
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Validate that all options are successfully read from VS settings. #66447
    Area-IDE
  • Support emitting type-parameter variance in syntax generator #66446
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for generating ref-members in SyntaxGenerator #66445
    Area-IDE
  • Enable EnC file logging during VS Feedback recording and collect the logs #66443
    Area-Interactive
  • Preserve changes that are still relevant after revert of #66311 #66440
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow directories in source generator outputs #66438
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Fix `this` and `params` modifiers generation #66390
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Initial syntax types for collection literals #66412
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66404
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Support generating conversion-operators from SyntaxGenerator #66444
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix reading VB editor options from ISettingsManager (main) #66399
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Catch exceptions when doing I/O to read the generator file version #66422
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix DateTime item's description in different culture #66420
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Replace placeholder XXX SDK version #66437
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Apply diagnostic filter to generator failure warnings #66263
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66449
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Ensure no extension method applies to System.Void #66416
    Area-Compilers
  • Optimize StringBuilder calculations for netcoreapp3.1 and newer #66156
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial support for collection literal parsing. #66417
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #66031
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs API Review
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Allow missing CommandLineArgsForDesignTimeEvaluation msbuild property #66367
    Area-IDE
  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
  • Fix mismatched per-language option storages #66421
    Area-IDE
  • Remove CS1701 and CS1702 warnings #66313
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Visit unreachable `when` clauses by `NullableWalker` #66405
  • Create a README for CLaSP #66083
    Area-IDE
  • Let LSP client know which diagnostics are build-only. #66329
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2088372 #66423
  • Ensure event handler generation and navigation in webforms works properly #66394
    Area-IDE
  • Emit copy when calling non-readonly method with ref readonly field receiver #66351
    Area-Compilers
  • Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly references #66430
    Area-Compilers
  • Visit query lambda by `NullableWalker` even without conversion #66384
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InferParameterBindingInfoConvention ignores property's binding source attributes #46140
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Performance] Long NativeAOT builds on Benchmarks.csproj #46139
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #46138
  • Anti Forgery Claim Extractor: option to define claim name #46137
  • The heartbeat has been running for ... which is longer than "00:00:01". ... #46135
  • When the dev-certs rotate, the exported PEM files for the SPA templates are not #46134
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #46133

Closed

  • Add CancellationToken to UserManager<>/SignInManager<> #45567
  • Blazor - Upgrading .NET 6 to .NET 7: "import.meta may only appear in a module" JS error #46073
  • Pseudo loc menu item appearing on project context menu (view in browser) #46089
  • .Net6.0 Razor Class Library cannot find view. #46114
  • Can we refer an external script in Blazor server application? #46136
  • Please find a way to put .net and other popular components in the CDN for wasm #46119
  • No warning / error message when ASP.Net Core 7 containerized application used the wrong Kestrel endpoint cert password #46016
  • .Net 7 - Json Serialization Case issue #45094
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #46113
  • [Question] interoperability of Redis backplane, with Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR #46105

PullRequests

Created

  • [blazor][wasm][debug]Press alt-shift-d and open firefox debug tab attached to the blazor app #46132
    area-blazor

Merged

  • [AOT] Remove AOT warning suppressions #46015
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Call CloseAsync instead of CloseOutputAsync in the browser #46012
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Don't check in blazor.*.js files #45883
    area-blazor
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • Enable setting ServerTimeout and KeepAliveInterval in HubConnectionBuilder #46065
    area-signalr
  • Add IRateLimiterStatisticsFeature with default implementation and tests #46028
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [AOT] Enable analysis and annotate Http.Results #46082
    area-web-frameworks
  • Move Kestrel shared source test attributes to src\Shared #46112
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • feat : Add `StringSyntax` for regex parameters #40589
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Enumerate paramnames on startup #46086
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Run test on Linux and Mac #45642
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Segfault when attaching twice #3600

Updated

  • dotnet-gcdump doesnt work with kubectl debug #3131

PullRequests

Merged

  • chore(readme): fix Debugging CoreCLR link #3606
  • PR for feature branch #3599

Updated

  • Add support for System.Diagnostics.Metrics in dotnet-monitor's collector #3587

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ScrollView with BindableLayout.ItemsSource is not recalculate new size on iOS #12727
  • DragGestureRecognizer CanDrag binding not working properly #12726
  • [WinUI] CarouselView "Scrolled" event never fires #12725
  • Add platform selectors in maui templates #12716
    Backlog
  • [Android]camera permission is not enabled on launching the maui app #12711
  • Refreshview makes scrollview vanish on android #12710
  • ResourceDictionary Source-Property not settable #12709
    Backlog

Closed

  • StackLayout IsEnabled Property does not work #5287
    .NET 7 Planning
  • IsEnabled not working properly for layout #4755
    Backlog
  • Image in Radio Button Not Displayed in Android Platform #12645
  • Where is toolbox? #12667
  • [SOLVED] Windows x86 Exception #12717
  • Custom Android Handler throws NRE when using Cell.ToPlatform(MauiContext) #11980
  • .Net MAUI - Shell Navigation Back button title not works properly - #iOS #12692
  • android application with testOnly option set to true can't be deployed #11345
    Backlog
  • Flyout items can vanish when arrowing down through a flyout. #11522
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Setting 'CanExecute' doesn't change the status of Button controls when they are bound to MVVM Commands #9753
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplification of interface declaration in code #12728
    community ✨
  • Update SemanticScreenReader API Docs #12724
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Share API Docs #12722
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Merge main into net8 #12715
  • Changes how propagate brushes changes #12714
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1462.37 to 1.0.1518.46 #12712
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Propagate VisualElement.IsEnabled to children #12488
  • Update Essentials Contact objects API Docs #12713
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Actions] Provide an actin that will bump the maui hash in the unified pipeline. #12718
    community ✨

Updated

  • Connect gestures LifeCycle to Container and Window #12259
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Make inline video / picture in picture enabled by default on WebView for iOS #11075
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Fix timing on iOS Toolbar #12363
    area/shell 🐢, area/toolbar
  • [release/7.0.1xx-sr1.2] Disable the windows deployment manager by default #12698
  • [Windows] Align Graphics APIs naming with the rest of the platforms #12578
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.2 to 4.14.2 #12686
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Generate everything splash related in the splash target #12481
    area/single project ☝️
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12679
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using EF Core 7 in net6 project #30085
  • Issue on managing one-on-one relationships #30084
  • Is there support for migrations from TPH/TPT to TPC planned? #30083
  • Mirosoft.Data.Sqlite 7.0, SQLite Error 19: 'FOREIGN KEY constraint failed' #30081
  • Exclude only base type table from Migrations #30079

Closed

  • AutoTransactionBehavior change breaks under AWS RDS Aurora MySql Proxy -- throws DbUpdateConcurrencyException #29785
  • How to mock response for GetConnectionString()? #30075
  • Method not found: 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IEntityType Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ModelExtensions.FindEntityType(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IModel, System.Type)'. #30032
  • Accessing Target context via `IQueryExpressionInterceptor` #30004
  • Does CVE-2022-35737 affect Microsoft.Data.Sqlite? #29429
    2.1.39

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow field navigations in proxies when lazy-loading is disabled for the navigation #30082
  • Move taking of lock earlier to avoid race in PruneCallback #30080

Merged

  • Scaffolding: Clean up code generation tests #29995
